resources.string: Songs Found..!\n Click on the DOWNLOAD SONGS button to open download page
Sorry No Downloads found Here.\n Select a Song, Album or a Playlist to fetch songs
This Page is still under development.\n Please wait till the next release to enjoy this Feature.\n Untill then check FREEMIUM_DOWNLOADS folder for downloaded songs.

Use the above Search bar to Search songs and the results appear here.\n Use Browse option [experimental] to browse songs directly from Saavn web UI.\n All downloaded songs will be saved to FREEMIUM_DOWNLOADS folder
Note : This a beta release of the app. So its common to have Bugs and Lags in the app. For further development of the app please report the bugs you find.

string.name: more_page_ClickText
string.u: Click here to Report a Bug or Suggest a feature.(use Gmail)

resources.string: Downloading Copyrighted music might be illegal in Some countries.\n © All Songs and Saavn™ belongs to JioSaavn.
